data.title: Dale Gillespie's Biography
data.meta_description: Dale Gillespie (1947-09-23 | 2022-04-30) - GILLESPIE, DALE JUNIOR, age 74, of Hazel Park passed away Saturday, April 30, 2022. In the days leading up to his death, he was surrounded by his spouse, siblin
data.text:
Memorial Biography

GILLESPIE, DALE JUNIOR, age 74, of Hazel Park passed away Saturday, April 30, 2022. In the days leading up to his death, he was surrounded by his spouse, siblings and 5 children as they shared stories, memories, laughter and tears.

Dale was born on September 23, 1947, in Mt. Pleasant, MI the son of Ivan Dale and Gladys (Petoskey) Gillespie. Dale was a man of many stories. If you ever had the opportunity to meet him chances are he sat you down to tell you a tale or two. A family man, in its truest form. Dale was devoted to his large family and could not have been more proud of what he built.

He was proceeded in death by his parents, a son, Michael Gillespie, a sister, Janice Cotter, brothers, David & Jerry Gillespie. Dale is survived by his loving wife LaDonna (McCain) Gillespie of Hazel Park; children Daniel (Christine) Gillespie of St. Clair Shores; Steven Gillespie of Kalamazoo; LuEllen (Christopher) Smith of St. Johns; Samantha (Phillip) Buzzette of New Baltimore; Alexander Gillespie of Hazel Park. Dale was a loving grandfather to; Danielle (Charlie), Alicia (Ron), Jessica (Justin), Samantha (Gil), Luke, Ryan, Hannah, Isabella, Bentley, Parker and 8 great grandchildren. Dale was the oldest of nine children, and five of his loving siblings survive him today: Rosie (Dave) Ebbinghaus, Ken (Luann) Gillespie, Sharon Wilkins, James (Karen) Gillespie and Shirley (Rocky) Koons. He leaves behind many nieces, nephews and great nieces and nephews that he very much enjoyed spending time with.

A celebration of life event will be held grave side at Memorial Gardens Cemetery in Mt. Pleasant MI at 11 am on Sunday, May 15th. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to an organization of your choosing.
